transArray.content: The sanitation is really clean, the service is very good, the breakfast is very good, and the location is very convenient. It is very convenient to go to Universal. I will definitely come back in the future. The room is very comfortable and the quilt is very soft.
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
